root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S01 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Camera Strap, Charging AC Adapter EH-69P, USB Cable UC-E16
Portrait, Land Scape, Night Portrait, Night Land Scape, Close-up or Back Lighting
256 Segment Matrix, Center Weighted (At Under 2x Digital Zoom), Spot (At 2x Digital Zoom and Up)

10.34 Million Total Pixels, Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Digital Zoom Magnification Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent to Approx: 348 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction: Motion Detection (Still Pictures), Focus Range: Approx: 50 cm to Infinity, Approx: 5 cm to Infinity (W) or Approx: 50 cm to Infinity (T) in Macro Close-up Mode, Focus-area Selection (Face Priority, Center, Manual (Tap to Select)), Frame Coverage (Shooting): Approx: 96% Vertical and Horizontal, Frame Coverage (Playback): Approx: 100% Vertical and Horizontal, Movie Frame Size (Pixels), HD 720p (1280 x 720), VGA (640 x 480), Exposure Control (2 EV in increment of 1/3 EV), Shutter Mechanical and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture Electronically-selected Neutral Density (ND) Filter (-3 AV), Flash Control TTL Auto with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol (MTP, PTP), 190 Pieces Still Pictures (with Built-in Battery), Movies (Actual Battery Life for Recording), EXPEED C2 Processing Engine, Intuitive Touch Screen Display, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Operating Humidity: 85 % or Less (Condensation)
Portrait, Land Scape, Night Portrait, Night Land Scape, Close-up or Back Lighting
Nikon Coolpix S01 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
Not Value for money. Nikon disappoints here !!

10.1 mp camera with a below average zoom of 3x that too priced at a hefty 9.5k... surely, its a no deal....Pros.good shutter speednice internal memory of around 7.5 gband a few features that wont be of much use for the people who use his kind of cameralight in weightCONSBUIlD FEELS CHEAPfor good pictures, a decent zoom of atleast 5x-8x is required, n not a 3x thingwell, this camera is a mistake by nikonCONCLUSIONYou are not going to invest your money in this thing when you can get things like nikon s6200 for 8.5-9k .. that has a good 16mp camera, 10x optical zoom...i own one for like 10 months, never felt any problem...and you having a 8gb internal is not VERY great, well wud u go for a camera just cause you dont have to carry a sd card??.. well it will be hectic to connect the camera to comp all time :|..it is also pretty light in weight, bt being 40-45gm lighter than a standard thing doesnt make much of a difference to us people who do photography just a hobby...JUST DONT GO FOR THIS. Its not worth the money, i cant understand why nikon even produced it :( DISAPPOINTED BY NIKON :(
I Just Love this Camera. Image Quality is also good but the optical zoom is very low. And It has really portable and small size my friend also love it.
Compact camera , touch screen, HD camera

This is an ultra-compact camera,It is an easy to use, basic features, touch screen interface, HD camera. Touch feel is good. There is a background music playing while slideshow . It has inbuilt storage memory(7.3GB) and no external storage card options. It has inbuilt battery(non-removable) battery. The camera can be charged directly by plugging the camera to the wall socket with the cable(and adapter) provided, just like in mobile phones.There is no tripod provision. The camera is value for the offer price.Flipkart never fails its customers,..... ever.

I brought this product and happy to use this.good product.very compact.good looking.simple to use & easy to carry. it has a little touch feature too. anyone willing to opt for this product can go for it.
